title: Shopify Product Scraper
description: Extract product data from any Shopify store using advanced JSON API and HTML parsing methods. Support for collections, search queries, variants, and pagination.

shopUrl.title: Shopify Store URL
shopUrl.description: The base URL of the Shopify store (e.g., https://www.allbirds.com or allbirds.com)

startUrls.title: Start URLs (Optional)
startUrls.description: Specific URLs to scrape (e.g., collection pages, product pages). If provided, shopUrl settings will be ignored.

collection.title: Collection Handle
collection.description: Specific collection to scrape (e.g., 'all', 'mens-shoes', 'new-arrivals'). Use 'all' for all products.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Search for products matching this query instead of scraping a collection.

maxProducts.title: Maximum Products
maxProducts.description: Maximum number of products to scrape. Leave empty or set to 0 for unlimited.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl for pagination. Safety limit to prevent infinite loops.

includeVariants.title: Include Product Variants
includeVariants.description: Include all product variants (sizes, colors, etc.) in the output.

includeOutOfStock.title: Include Out of Stock Products
includeOutOfStock.description: Include products that are currently out of stock.

debugLog.title: Debug Logging
debugLog.description: Enable detailed debug logs for troubleshooting.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests. Higher values = faster scraping but more resources.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing rate limits. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
